All original packing must be included. #Up for Sale is a 2018 Jackson X Series Kelly KEX Electric Guitar! Satin Black w / Gold Hardware Finish! This is really cool. You are looking at a 2018 Jackson X Series Kelly KEX Guitar. Awesome Shredder Guitar. High Performance "Go Fast" with a super quick Neck. From The Web: You don't need to sacrifice tone or style with the Jackson X Series Kelly KEX electric guitar. You've got two high-output Jackson humbucking pickups, able to deliver some of the most aggressive tones out there. And you can dive-bomb to your heart's content, thanks to the Floyd Rose licensed tremolo bridge. Best of all, the compound-radius fretboard means you'll have exceptional playability across the entire neck. Crank up your favorite amplifier, dig into a big fat chord, and the Kelly KEX will absolutely sing. Armed with a slab top, electrifying angular shape and lightning-fast neck, X Series Kelly™ models exude metal sophistication, while also delivering massive sound and reliable performance at an exceptional value. The KEX features lightwood and resonant poplar body-wings, one-piece through-body maple neck with graphite reinforcement and scarf joint, and a 12”-16” compound radius laurel fingerboard with 24 jumbo frets and pearloid sharkfin inlays. Ready to roar, the KEX is also equipped with a pair of volcanic Jackson high-output humbucking pickups, single volume and tone controls, three-way toggle switch and a Floyd Rose® Special double-locking tremolo system, providing amazing tone, exceptional dynamic response and reliable performance. The KEX is available in Gloss Black with eye-catching gold hardware and white binding along the body, neck and Jackson® pointed 6-in-line headstock.Tech Specs Body Type: Solidbody Body Shape: Kelly Left-/Right-handed: Right-handed Number of Strings: 6 Body Material: Basswood Body Finish: Satin Color: Black Neck Material: Maple Neck Shape: Neck-thru Radius: 12" to 16" compound Fingerboard Material: Dark Rosewood, bound Fingerboard Inlay: Pearloid sharkfin Number of Frets: 24, Jumbo Scale Length: 25.5" Nut Width: 1.6875" Nut Material: Locking nut Bridge/Tailpiece: Floyd Rose Special double-locking tremolo Tuners: Jackson sealed die-cast Neck Pickup: Jackson High Output Humbucker Bridge Pickup: Jackson High Output Humbucker Controls: 1 x volume, 1 x tone, 3-way toggle pickup switch Our luthier did a complete setup.
